changeSet.author: glasir
changeSet.sql:
-- @version $Id: //app/portal/version/10.1.1/paf/sql/membership_ddl.xml#1 $$Change: 690623 $
create table mem_membership_req ( id varchar2(40) not null, internal_version number(10) default 0 not null, user_id varchar2(40) not null, community_id varchar2(40) not null, request_type number(1,0) not null, creation_date timestamp not null ,constraint mem_membershiprq_p primary key (id) ,constraint mem_membershiprq_c check (request_type in (0,1)));
